A <kanji>person</kanji> who <kanji>wander</kanji>s because their lord was killed, is known as a <vocabulary>ronin</vocabulary>, or a <vocabulary>masterless samurai</vocabulary>. Now they're just like the rest of us, but they can't stop wandering because they have nowhere they belong.
